titles.title: To permit a dependent of a Federal employee who is currently enrolled in the Department of Defense domestic dependent elementary and secondary school system in Puerto Rico to continue such enrollment until graduation from secondary school.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Readiness.

bill.summary: 11/6/2001--Introduced. Entitles a dependent of a Federal employee who is currently enrolled in the Department of Defense domestic dependent elementary and secondary school system in Puerto Rico to continue such enrollment until graduation from secondary school.States that such entitlement does not limit the authority of the Secretary of Defense to remove such a dependent from enrollment for good cause.
